episodes.title: Tariqa or Cult? Former Member of Nuh Keller’s Group Speaks Out
episodes.description:
Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAbCD-5UBVTmdbfnagKeGEQ/join

In this powerful episode, we sit down with a survivor who once lived inside a cultic religious community—one that operated under the appearance of spirituality, discipline, and Islamic tradition.

Behind the scenes, however, members faced intense control, manipulation, emotional abuse, and spiritual pressure designed to keep them silent and compliant.

Our guest courageously shares:
• How they were introduced to the group
• What life looked like inside the community
• The red flags and turning points
• The emotional, spiritual, and social toll
• The difficult process of leaving
• A heartfelt message to those still trapped inside

This conversation isn’t about attacking faith—it’s about exposing the misuse of faith to control people. It’s about healing, truth, and giving a voice to those who are still afraid to speak.

If you or someone you know has experienced spiritual abuse, this episode may help you understand that you’re not alone—and healing is possible.

🔔 Subscribe for more survivor stories, discussions on cult dynamics, and support for those rebuilding after religious trauma. https://www.youtube.com/@RETURN2FITRAH?sub_confirmation=1

episodes.title: Sufism and the TMOA Cult: Interview with Karim Koscenda
episodes.description:
Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAbCD-5UBVTmdbfnagKeGEQ/join

**YouTube Video Description:**

In this exclusive interview, Karim Koscenda sits down to discuss *Sufism* and the *TMOA (The Muslims of America)* cult — unpacking the differences between authentic Islamic spirituality and the distortions that occur when power, control, and manipulation enter religious movements.

We explore:

* How cult dynamics can emerge under religious pretexts
* The warning signs of spiritual abuse
* Why critical thinking and knowledge of the Deen are essential

Join us for an eye-opening conversation that challenges misconceptions and sheds light on the importance of distinguishing between genuine spiritual guidance and cult behavior.

#Sufism #TMOA #CultAwareness #KarimKoscenda #IslamicLeadership #SpiritualAbuse #MuslimCommunity #FaithAndPower #Deen #IslamicEducation #CultExposed #Ummah #LeadershipInIslam #SufismExplained
